item.title: building a digital garden with Logseq and Hugo
item.description: We, as people, are social animals. We live together, we work together, we relax together, but what about learning together? In these days of global pandemics and, be honest, living inside our digital tools we have slowly gone back to being not-very-social. [Digital gardens](digital garden) are one way to overcome this modern ill. Learning and building/creating in such a way that it is easy for others to see and/or comment on what you do and learn.

item.title: digital garden
item.description: Note: This place is currently a placeholder, hugo gets upset if links are missing. References Building a digital garden A Brief History & Ethos of the Digital Garden Also: MaggieAppleton/digital-gardeners: Resources, links, projects, and ideas for gardeners tending their digital notes on the public interwebs
